shareables.name: Jumbo Pretzel
shareables.description: Baked, not fried, pretzel served with house-made Belgian beer cheese sauce and Stout beer mustard.

shareables.name: Wings
shareables.description: Hot Buffalo, Mai Chau Hot, Thai Curry, Buffalo, Garlic Parmesan, Buffalo Ranch Dry Rub, or Viet Style.

shareables.name: Saigon Sliders
shareables.description: Sriracha pulled pork, Mai Chau sauce, ginger slaw.

shareables.name: Fried Cheese Curds
shareables.description: Local Black Radish Creamery curds with Marinara.

shareables.name: Pub Fries
shareables.description: Hand cut with house pub sauce.

shareables.name: Loaded Fries
shareables.description: Pub fries loaded with cheese, bacon, jalapeño, tomato, with red and green onion.

shareables.name: Mai Chau Cracklins
shareables.description: Served with house-made honey Aleppo seasoning.

shareables.name: Thai Nachos
shareables.description: Corn tortillas, your choice of house beer cheese OR Colby cheese, avocado, bean sprouts, Mai Chau sauce, green onion, cilantro, and peanuts.
shareables.options: Add pulled pork, chicken, or tofu +4

shareables.name: Pork Dumplings
shareables.description: Served with house-made dim sum dipping sauce.

shareables.name: Summer Roll
shareables.description: Hand rolled vermicelli rice noodle, fresh veggies, and herbs in a rice paper roll served with house-made peanut sauce.

shareables.name: Viet Style Veggie Spring Rolls
shareables.description: Served with sweet Thai chili sauce.

items.name: Pho
items.description: House made Vietnamese beef stock with rice noodles, white and green onion, bean sprouts, sliced jalapeño, fresh herbs, lime wedge with your choice of beef brisket, rare beef*, or a combination.

items.name: Rice or Noodle Bowl
items.description: Choose steamed Jasmine rice or Vermicelli rice noodles with leaf lettuce, cucumber, carrot, bean sprouts, cilantro, crushed peanuts, fried garlic, soy sauce, and house made peanut sauce with your choice of protein/veg.

items.name: Fried Rice Bowl
items.description: Stir fried rice with cucumber, carrot, bean sprouts, cilantro, crushed peanuts, fried garlic, soy sauce, and yum yum sauce with your choice of protein/veg.

items.name: Banh Mi
items.description: Traditional Vietnamese toasted French baguette sandwich with house made spicy mayo, jalapeño, cucumber, ginger slaw, cilantro, and your choice of protein/veg.

items.name: Tempura Shrimp
items.description: Tempura fried shrimp, creamy ginger cabbage, and green onion.

items.name: Fried Pork Belly
items.description: Filipino style fried pork belly, cucumber, jalapeno, and Mai Chau sauce.

items.name: Fried Mushroom
items.description: Marinated portobello, wasabi slaw, spicy mayo, and cilantro.

items.name: Japanese Fried Chicken
items.description: Karaage style fried chicken thigh, miso ginger marinated cabbage, and yum-yum sauce.

items.name: Thai Burger
items.description: House pickled veggies, lettuce and Thai ketchup.

handhelds.note: Served with hand cut fries. Sub any burger with grilled marinated portobello.

items.name: Viet Dip
items.description: Shaved roast beef, Swiss and white American cheese, caramelized onion, sautéed peppers and mushrooms, and bean sprouts on baguette with side of pho jus.

items.name: Lamb Gyro
items.description: Marinated sliced lamb, lettuce, tomato, red onion, Tzatziki sauce, and feta cheese. (Fries and hummus as your side.)

items.name: Fiesta Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Seasoned chicken, guacamole, lettuce, onion, jalapeno, and pico de Gallo on a sesame seed bun.

items.name: Cajun Fish Sandwich
items.description: Blackened walleye fillet, red onion, tomato, and spring mix on sesame seed bun.

items.name: Classic Burger
items.description: 6oz Steak burger, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on sesame seed bun.
items.options: Add bacon +1, sub beef patty for grilled chicken.

items.name: Mai Chau Burger
items.description: Double decker of two 6oz American Wagyu beef patties, American cheese, thousand Thailand dressing, shredded lettuce, sliced pickle, and white onion on sesame seed bun.

items.name: Mushroom + Swiss Burger
items.description: 6oz Steak burger sautéed mushrooms and Swiss cheese on a sesame seed bun.

items.name: Butter Burger
items.description: 8oz steak burger, griddled over diced onion and herb butter, topped with American cheese.

items.name: Grilled Portobello Wrap
items.description: Grilled marinated portobello cap, goat cheese, red onion, Spring mix, tomato, and spicy mayo on spinach wrap.

salads.note: Add lemongrass chicken, Filipino pork belly, sriracha pulled pork, Thai chili tofu, sweet and spicy cauliflower, grilled chicken breast +5, or steak +6

items.name: Mai Chau Salad Bowl
items.description: Mixed greens, cucumber, carrot, bean sprouts, herbs, and crushed peanuts with our ginger sesame vinaigrette.

items.name: The Firehouse
items.description: Spring mix greens, tomato, carrot, red onion, cucumber, fresh strawberries, Mandarin oranges, Chow Mein noodles, with a Chai balsamic vinaigrette.

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, avocado, tomato, bacon bits, guacamole, hard boiled egg, and grilled chicken. served with our house made ranch dressing.

items.name: Caesar
items.description: Romaine, shaved parm, croutons, and house made Caesar dressing.

kids.note: For children 12 and under, includes drink. Buns, nuggets, and burger also includes a side.

items.name: Little Tiger Bowl
items.description: Steamed rice, fried rice or noodles, cucumber, carrot, soy sauce, and choice of protein/veg.

items.name: Jeb Dude
items.description: Kid size pho with chicken and carrot.

items.name: Fried Rice
items.description: With choice of protein/veg.

items.name: Pizza Steamed Buns
items.description: Pizza sauce, pepperoni, and mozzarella.

items.name: Japanese Chicken Nuggets
items.description: Served with honey for dipping.

items.name: Classic Cheeseburger
items.description: 5oz beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, and tomato on a split-up bun.
items.options: Add bacon +1, add an extra patty +
